name: Epidemiological Data from the nCoV-2019 Outbreak: Early Descriptions from Publicly Available Data
description: Location for summaries and analyses of data related to n-CoV 2019, first reported in Wuhan, China.

variableMeasured.name: id
variableMeasured.description: Unique identifier of case

variableMeasured.name: age
variableMeasured.description: Age or age range of case

variableMeasured.name: sex
variableMeasured.description: Sex of the case

variableMeasured.name: city
variableMeasured.description: City of the case

variableMeasured.name: province
variableMeasured.description: Province of the case

variableMeasured.name: country
variableMeasured.description: Country of the case

variableMeasured.name: latitude
variableMeasured.description: The latitude of the location of the case

variableMeasured.name: longitude
variableMeasured.description: The longitude of the location of the case

variableMeasured.name: geo_resolution
variableMeasured.description: The resolution to which the location of the case is known

variableMeasured.name: date_onset_symptoms
variableMeasured.description: The date when the patient started to experience symptoms

variableMeasured.name: date_admission_hospital
variableMeasured.description: The date when the patient was admitted to hospital

variableMeasured.name: date_confirmation
variableMeasured.description: The date at which infection with SARS-COV-2 was confirmed

variableMeasured.name: symptoms
variableMeasured.description: Symptoms of the patient

variableMeasured.name: lives_in_wuhan
variableMeasured.description: Whether the individual lives in Wuhan

variableMeasured.name: travel_history_dates
variableMeasured.description: Dates at which the individual was travelling

variableMeasured.name: travel_history_location
variableMeasured.description: Locations the individual traveled to

variableMeasured.name: reported_market_exposure
variableMeasured.description: Whether the individual was known to have been exposed at the seafood market

variableMeasured.name: additional_information
variableMeasured.description: Additional information data curators have found

variableMeasured.name: chronic_disease_binary
variableMeasured.description: Whether the patient had a preexisting chronic disease

variableMeasured.name: chronic_disease
variableMeasured.description: The nature of a preexisting chronic disease

variableMeasured.name: source
variableMeasured.description: The source where the information was obtained

variableMeasured.name: sequence_available
variableMeasured.description: Whether a sequence of the virus is available

variableMeasured.name: outcome
variableMeasured.description: How the infection resolved in the patient

variableMeasured.name: date_death_or_discharge
variableMeasured.description: Whether the patient was discharged or died

variableMeasured.name: notes_for_discussion
variableMeasured.description: Further free form notes

variableMeasured.name: location
variableMeasured.description: additional location data

variableMeasured.name: admin3
variableMeasured.description: additional location data

variableMeasured.name: admin2
variableMeasured.description: additional location data

variableMeasured.name: admin1
variableMeasured.description: additional location data

variableMeasured.name: country_new
variableMeasured.description: additional location data

variableMeasured.name: admin_id
variableMeasured.description: additional location data
